p: The report has four categories, each appearing as a subtab in the report.
This tutorial describes the Citing Decisions portion of the report, which contains citing primary authority, including agency and case law decisions.
You can view citing decisions as a List or a Grid. The Grid view depicts the complete set of citing decisions based on both court and date.

section.title: Citing Decisions List
p: The Citing Decisions list displays decisions sorted by:
Use the column headings or the "Sort by" menu to change the order in which they appear.

Color-coded icons indicate the signal-generating value of the editorial phrase next to each icon. Hover on an icon to display its meaning. You also can select the Legend button to display descriptions of all symbols used in the report.

section.title: Citing Decisions Grid
p: Citing decisions are represented graphically by 2 grids. One grid shows analysis by court, the other shows analysis over time.
